doc.name: point
doc.summary: Used with the is a and is not a operators to specify whether a value is a point.

examples.example: if it is not a point then exit mouseUp

description.p: Use the point keyword to find out whether a value can be used in expressions that require a point on the screen.
If the value consists of two numbers separated by a comma or by whitespace, it is a point. The numbers may be non-integers.
